about_the_game:
"

Shadow of the Demon Lord Master Paths of Shadow Bundle


This product contains the following:


Paths of Darkness

Paths of Darkness, first of a two-part installment, presents a selection of dreadful master paths for use in Shadow of the Demon Lord.


Paths of Horror

Paths of Horror continues to explore vile and unsettling master paths to offer characters with little regard for themselves or others opportunities to attain might, fortune, and glory in the world darkened by the Shadow of the Demon Lord.


Paths of Iron

Paths of Iron introduces a set of expert and master paths that focus on iron and steel. The bulwark masters forging armor and bestowing on it special properties, while the fae scourge seizes upon faeries' innate aversion to the metal and develops combat techniques to exploit iron's influence on them. With the options presented in this supplement, your character can take the steps along the iron road.


Paths of Science

Paths of Science adds new expert paths for characters ready to embark on scientific careers, such as a plague doctor, a maker of monsters, or even a reanimator. It also expands on the options for rogues with a set of new roguery talents that exploit scientific discovery.

The core of this product is 5 expert paths and 20 master paths. The paths are as follows:
  • Expert:
  • Biologist
  • Bulwark
  • Gunsmith
  • Plague Doctor
  • Reen Scavenger

Master:
  • Agonist
  • Brain in a Jar
  • Catastrophist
  • Demagogue
  • Fae Scourge
  • Filth Mage
  • Forgehammer
  • Gorger
  • Magnet
  • Mother of Monsters
  • Multiplist
  • Puzzle
  • Reanimator
  • Shadow Thief
  • Soul Eater
  • Sybarite
  • Thresher
  • Unbodied
  • Verminist
  • Worm Host
"

Shadow of the Demon Lord Master Paths of Shadow Bundle
